body:
Hi Dear Mostapha

I want to cached prebuilt skymatrix.

how can I do that?

I am making some clusters for analysis sheet builder.

a sheet with 4 seasons solar analysis for sun,wind,cloud,..

so I must use cached and reusable data for all parts that is possible.



thanks

replies.body: Hi Hossein, That's sort of what ladybug does for the skymatrix. "Ladybug_GenCumulativeSkyMtx" caches the data into the memory and "Ladybug_selectSkyMtx" loads them without re-running the sky calculation.
